0.title: Buyers Bootcamp

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

0.plot: Scott McGillivray offers an opportunity for amateur investors to partner with him to buy -- and profit from -- investment properties throughout North America. Together, they either sink or swim.

1.title: Luxury Victorian vs. Multi-Level Duplex

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Craig and Lindsay have a heritage home requiring restoration, while Kenson and Charles have an average home presenting a unique opportunity; Scott McGillivray will have to crunch the numbers to decide which proposal is the safer bet.

2.title: Charming Victorian vs. Shabby Semi

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Scott has to decide between a massive Victorian fixer-upper and a dilapidated semi-detached. Both houses are in hot markets, but the rookie mistakes that have already been made will play a big part in his decision.

3.title: Quaint Two-Storey vs. Abandoned Bungalow

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Scott must choose between a cute yet dated two-story home and a neglected bungalow with a basement apartment. With his money on the line, he'll have to decide which property stands the best chance for success.

4.title: Wartime Gem vs. Dated Bungalow

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Scott chooses between a young couple with a tenanted house in a great neighborhood and a mother-son team with frozen bungalow flip.

5.title: Builder Basic vs. Backwards Bungalow

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: A desperate married couple and two business-minded sisters compete for Scott's cash in a suburban face-off. When faced with the realities of both situations, he may need to forget the numbers and go with his gut.

6.title: Luxury Victorian vs. Multi-Level Duplex

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Scott has to choose between an upscale heritage home that requires extensive restoration and an average home with a very unique building opportunity in an unfamiliar market.

7.title: Ranch Style Rehab vs. Cape Cod Fixer Upper

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

9.title: Battle of the Beachside Bungalows

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Scott debates partnering with a couple new to flipping and another one struck in the mid-flip crisis.

10.title: Battle of the Beachside Bungalows

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Scott debates partnering with a couple new to flipping and another couple stuck in a mid-flip crisis. He is confident that he can't make a wrong choice, but some exterior issues prove there's no such thing as a sure bet.

11.title: Dated Design vs. Irregular Layout

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Scott thinks he has an easy decision to make after touring a dated house in need of an overhaul and a large home with a bizarre layout. But then an unexpected change in financing causes him to change his mind on the spot.

-1.title: Swimming Pool Showdown

episode of.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray (TV Series 2018– )

-1.plot: Scott takes his investment dollars to sunny south Florida, where he's pitched two appealing properties. Both have great value-adding potential, but structural issues make Scott question whether he will sink or swim.

imdb.title: Buyers Bootcamp with Scott McGillivray
plot: Scott McGillivray partners with amateur house flippers across North America and invests his own money, time and resources to help them renovate rundown homes.
